description: I was just about going out for lunch where I was supposed to meet a friend when I saw an awesome delivery guy waiting for quite a while in front of a building. As I always have my cam in my bag I switched it on and went straight towards him. He was actually a bit scared of the cam and I could feel that he felt unpleasant. But after a short while our conversation became an open talk about everything. He told me about his bad salary and I could understand that life can be sometimes quite difficult. On the other hand I saw my chance and told him that I make castings for a movie-agency. I even told him that it is sometimes about adult-movies and for a little financial bonus he agreed to a live casting in his van. And that´s how we started...
title: Czech Hunter 219
